entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued August 17 at 10:17AM PDT until August 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Mid level moisture and a hot unstable atmosphere will aid in scattered thunderstorm development this afternoon and evening as an upper level disturbance moves across the region. WARM OVERNIGHT LOW TEMPERATURES AND POOR OVERNIGHT RELATIVE HUMIDITY RECOVERY WILL ALSO CONTRIBUTE TO FIRE CONCERNS TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY MORNING.
